subtasks: Select appropriate pesticide (considering its type and formulation)
Read and understand pesticide label instructions
Wear protective clothing and equipment (e.g., full coverage, neoprene gloves, goggles)
Follow safety measures (e.g., avoid wind drift, keep unauthorized people away)
Administer first aid for pesticide poisoning if necessary
Secure pesticide containers in a plastic tub or bucket
Dispose of pesticide containers properly after use
Store pesticides in a cool, dry place away from water and streams

tasks.task: Transfer pesticides from container to applicator
subtasks: Mix pesticides with water as needed (for flowable formulations)
Use appropriate application equipment for the pesticide formulation (e.g., special equipment for solutions, low-pressure sprayers for some formulations)

tasks.task: Apply pesticides to crops via spraying or other methods as per label instructions
subtasks: Ensure proper coverage and target areas when applying pesticides
Monitor drift and take measures to prevent off-target contamination
